message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to own this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the significant benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $850,000? I believe this would still provide a good return on investment while staying within my financial limits.

Bob, I understand your desire to work within your budget. While $950,000 represents a fair price considering the product's worth, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $900,000? This offer reflects my strong commitment to making this deal work.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I propose a price of $875,000 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests and respects the value of the item.
